name: 9th International Conference on New Approaches in Education
content: Structured on the aspect of Open Access Knowledge Sharing, the 9th International Conference on New Approaches in Education aims to do just that. For us, good education always transcends any geographical boundaries. Our previous conference education 2025 have received stellar reviews and welcomed attendees from all over the world. We plan to make this our best education conference yet! This international conference on education will feature a high-quality program, which is the result of the rigorous quality standards employed by the scientific committee. We will dive into topics like Inclusive Education, e-learning, Curriculum Development, Global Issues in Education and Research, and so many more. Weâ€™re bringing together global academics, researchers, scholars, and leaders of for-and non-profits to this world-class event. Broaden your horizons and learn all about how to amplify your academic career! Join in discourse with leading experts and fellow peers, present your work, or even get published as a researcher!
